## What is PC Miler 20?
 
PC Miler 20 is a software that helps you plan optimal routes, calculate precise mileage, and manage your operations efficiently. PC Miler 20 uses a comprehensive street-level digital map of the North American road network that includes the most comprehensive set of commercial truck restrictions you wonât find anywhere else. PC Miler 20 also offers global routing for international transportation.
 
### What are the benefits of PC Miler 20?
 
PC Miler 20 can help you improve your performance, profitability, and safety in every route you plan. Here are some of the benefits of using PC Miler 20:
 
- Reduce out-of-route mileage and fuel costs by finding the shortest and most practical routes for your vehicles.
- Increase customer satisfaction and retention by meeting delivery windows and providing accurate ETA.
- Ensure compliance with Hours of Service regulations and avoid fines by planning routes with intelligent rest stop suggestions.
- Optimize driver pay and billing by using industry standard mileage calculations based on your preferences.
- Analyze lane rates and profitability by using historical and real-time data from various sources.
- Enhance safety and security by avoiding low bridges, weight limits, hazardous materials restrictions, and other road hazards.
